title: 9.1.5 Secrets Manager and Parameter Store scanner
body:
## Parent Epic
Part of Epic 9: Advanced Security Scanning (#127)

## Objective
Implement security scanning for AWS Secrets Manager and Systems Manager Parameter Store checking for rotation policies, access controls, encryption, and unused secrets.

## Requirements
- Scan Secrets Manager secrets and configurations
- Scan Parameter Store parameters (standard and advanced)
- Check automatic rotation configuration
- Verify KMS encryption for secrets and secure parameters
- Analyze IAM and resource policies for overly permissive access
- Detect secrets not accessed in 90+ days (unused)
- Check for secrets without expiration dates
- Verify replication configuration for critical secrets
- Detect potential secrets stored in plain text parameters
- Integration with Intelligence-Builder SDK for secret lifecycle analysis

## Security Rules to Implement

### Secrets Manager Rules
- Secret missing automatic rotation
- Secret not accessed in 90+ days
- Secret missing KMS encryption
- Secret with overly permissive resource policy
- Secret not replicated for high-availability applications
- Secret missing tags for classification
- Secret rotation configuration invalid or broken

### Parameter Store Rules
- Secure parameter missing KMS encryption
- Parameter containing credentials not marked as SecureString
- Parameter with overly permissive IAM policy
- Parameter not accessed in 90+ days
- Parameter missing description or tags
- Advanced parameter tier used unnecessarily

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Secrets Manager scanner module implemented with all rules
- [ ] Parameter Store scanner module implemented with all rules
- [ ] Scanner identifies all secrets and parameters across accounts
- [ ] Pattern detection for credentials in plain text parameters
- [ ] Each rule produces clear finding with severity and remediation
- [ ] Integration with Intelligence-Builder SDK for lifecycle analysis
- [ ] Unit tests cover all rules (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration tests validate scanning against test secrets
- [ ] Documentation includes rule descriptions and remediation guidance
- [ ] Scanner performance: <1s per secret/parameter

## Technical Approach
- Use boto3 Secrets Manager and SSM clients
- Implement pattern matching for credential detection in plain text
- Use CloudTrail integration for access tracking (optional enhancement)
- Cache KMS key configurations to reduce API calls
- Leverage Intelligence-Builder SDK for secret lifecycle recommendations

## Estimated Effort
18-22 hours

## Dependencies
- AWS Secrets Manager and Systems Manager API access
- KMS read permissions for encryption verification
- CloudTrail read access for usage tracking (optional)
- Intelligence-Builder SDK integration
